dict.string: OpenResponses needs access to your photo library to allow you to attach images to your AI conversations.
OpenResponses needs access to your documents folder to allow you to attach files to your AI conversations.
OpenResponses needs access to your files to allow you to upload and attach them to your AI conversations.
OpenResponses uses your location once to autofill city/region/country for web search relevance. This is optional.
OpenResponses connects to your local network to reach a trusted automation server you control.
